mapper.sql:
WHERE 1=1
AND a.delNy = #{shDelNy} AND a.delNy = 0
AND cgSeq = #{shValue} AND cgName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND cgNameEng LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
AND date(createdAt) BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(DATE_FORMAT(#{shStartDate}, '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00'), '%Y-%m-%d %T') AND STR_TO_DATE(DATE_FORMAT(#{shEndDate}, '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00'), '%Y-%m-%d %T') AND date(updatedAt) BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(DATE_FORMAT(#{shStartDate}, '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00'), '%Y-%m-%d %T') AND STR_TO_DATE(DATE_FORMAT(#{shEndDate}, '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00'), '%Y-%m-%d %T')
mapper.select:
SELECT a.* , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM commonCode b where a.cgSeq = b.cgSeq) as cnt FROM codeGroup a
ORDER BY seq DESC LIMIT #{rowNumToShow} OFFSET #{startRnumForMysql}
SELECT count(*) as total FROM codeGroup a WHERE 1=1 AND a.delNy = 0
SELECT a.* FROM codeGroup a WHERE 1=1 AND a.seq = #{seq};
mapper.update: UPDATE codeGroup a SET a.delNy = 1 , updatedAt = now() WHERE a.seq = #{seq}
